title: Josh Gondelman And Catherine Cohen: Brooklyn Famous
description: Josh Gondelman, talks about why he gives strangers pep talks on Twitter, and Catherine Cohen explains how she makes her cabaret comedy into fashion. This episode originally aired June 14, 2019.

itunes:summary: Josh Gondelman and Catherine Cohen play a game of two truths and a lie: sports superstition edition.
